name: D2DTHEPI.WAD
description: These are the best Deathmatch levels I and my friends have made over the last 2 years. It covers nearly all types of DM, fraggin Fragfests to sniper levels, there will be at least ONE you'll find amazing ! LOTS of fun guaranteed (thoroughly playtested) ! Features are: -23 selfmade deathmatch levels (8 DOOM 1 levels revised for DOOM 2, 22 unreleased) -30 musical scores, revised DOOM 1/2 music -2 new sfx (Heretic), 1 sfx differently arranged -3 new graphics (Sky textures and Intermission screen)
